CustomField.description: Describe how you repackage similar products to standardize inventory and distribution. Example: Pads - 30, Tampons - 20, Liners - 30.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Describe how you repackage similar products to standardize inventory and distribution. Example: Pads - 30, Tampons - 20, Liners - 30.
CustomField.label: Repackaged Product-unmixed
